participant_1.background:
I grew up in the south and learned to cook from my mother.
i m a night owl , but i m an introvert so i don t go out much or anything.
I listen to the Beatles every morning before work to start my day off on the right foot.
I went to Rome and ate a lot of delicious pasta.
I maintained a healthy weight last year.

participant_2.background:
I love to dress up and go to comic cons with my husband.
my mother worked for apple.
I am not out to my family and I am worried about their acceptance.
i drive a bmw.
my favorite outfit is thigh high leather boots and a skirt.

content.text: I'm doing great! How are you doing today?
I'm doing good, thanks for asking! I'm just hanging out at home watching some tv.
Oh, that sounds nice! I'm getting ready to go to a comic con with my husband.
Oh, that sounds fun! I love comic cons! What are you dressing up as?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking of doing either Harley Quinn or Poison Ivy.
Those are both great choices! I love Harley Quinn.
Thanks! Me too. I'm excited to see how it turns out.
I'm sure it will look great! What's your favorite thing about comic cons?
I love the atmosphere and the people. Everyone is so friendly and excited to be there.
I know what you mean! I love that sense of community.
Me too! It's like a big family reunion.
That's a great way to put it! I'm glad you're having a good time at comic con.
Thanks! I am! I hope you have a great day too!
